name: Invasion Of The Spacemen
description:
Controls

W,A,S,D To Move
1,2,3 Change Guns
Left Mouse Button To Shoot
TAB Key To Access Level Up Menu
ESC Key To Pause Game
How To Play
Survive Long Enough For The Teleporter  To Spawn
For Every Level Up Or Teleport You Get A Upgrade Point To Go Towards Upgrading Your Weapons
